title: just reconnect , windows 10 problem
body:
i just installed windows 10 and got every thing set, tried to play some games and everything is working.
when i start a game in lol it doesn't go to the loading flair, it just puts me the reconnect butten and even if i press it a million times no errors pups up and it just stays the same ( reconnect ) .
so basically  i can't reconnect !

replies.body: So you're never able to see the loading screen at all? This might be some kind of weird permissions issue, so let's make sure you're still launching League with admin rights by running through the steps in our [**permissions guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions). Let me know if that doesn't help though, and we can try a couple other options too.
